text: The Green party (Norwegian: Miljøpartiet de Grønne) is a green political party in Norway. They gained one representative in the Storting (the Norwegian Parliament) in the 2013 election.https://www.stortinget.no/en/In- English/Members-of-the-Storting/Parliamentary-Party-Groups/Green-Party/ The representative, Rasmus Hansson, was also the spokesperson of the party. The party won three seats in the 2021 Norwegian parliamentary election. == References == == Other websites == * The Storting's official website * Category:Political parties in Norway Category:Green political parties
title: Green Party (Norway)
